connector.description: Allows sending messages to any endpoint that supports the MQTT protocol, such as a message broker.

camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.topic.name: camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.topic
camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.topic.description: The topic to send messages to Example: mytopic

camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.brokerUrl.name: camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.brokerUrl
camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.brokerUrl.description: The URL of the broker where to establish the connection Example: tcp://mosquitto:1883

camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.username.name: camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.username
camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.username.description: Username to use when connecting to the MQTT broker

camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.password.name: camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.password
camel.kamelet.mqtt-sink.password.description: Password to use when connecting to the MQTT broker
